tha-ap24:8.1: Tathā → tattha (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), bhūmi → nemi (bj) | kācehi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap24:12.1: sattahi ratnehi → sattaratanehi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap24:14.1: assumha → assumhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | āsimhā (?)
tha-ap24:19.2: akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃ → akaruttarakañcukaṃ (bj) | ... akaruṃ tāva kañcukaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ... akaruttarakañcukaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap24:31.4: āloko hoti → ālokā honti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap24:38.4: kubbaṃ na tappare → kubbantanappakaṃ (bj) | kubbanti tappare (pts-vp-pli1ed)
